label: First CBM + additional CBM
label_zh: 首立方 + 续立方（大货）
description: Charge by volume (CBM): first X m³ at a fixed price, then Y per m³. If weight exceeds max weight, chargeable volume = max(actual CBM, actual weight / volumetric factor). Used for sea/large freight.
description_zh: 按体积(CBM)计费：首 X 立方一口价，超出按 Y 元/立方。若实际重量超过设定最大重量，则计费体积 = max(实际体积, 实重/体积重系数)。适用于海运/大件。

form_schema.label: First volume (m³)
form_schema.helperText: First CBM included in the first-tier price.

form_schema.label: First CBM price
form_schema.helperText: Fixed price for the first CBM.

form_schema.label: Max weight (kg) before volume-weight rule
form_schema.label_zh: 最大重量(kg)，超过则按体积重计
form_schema.helperText: Above this weight, chargeable volume = max(actual CBM, weight / volumetric factor).

form_schema.label: Volumetric factor (optional)
form_schema.helperText: Divisor for volume weight: weight_kg / factor = volume equivalent (e.g. 5000).
